input.job_description:
Mohammad Ar qam Naeem Sahgal
arqamnaeemsaighol@gmail.com
| +92 311 0260910 |
https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohammad-arqam-sahgal
| Lahore, Pakistan
EDUCATION
FAST - National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences (NUCES), Lahore, Pakistan
2017-2021
Bachelor of Science, Electrical Engineering
-
Add. Courses: Engineering Economics, Entrepreneurship, Engineering and Project Management
Aitchison College, Lahore, Pakistan
2014-2016
A-Levels and O-Levels
EXPERIENCE
Foodpanda-Delivery Hero 
Executive-Virtual Account Management                                                                                            Feb 2022 – Present 
●
Part of an APAC initiative known as the VKAM project, with a pivotal role led my team to become
top performing 
across APAC for two consecutive quarters. 
●
Managing and expanding relationships with an inventory of
1000+
existing long tail vendors per quarter. 
●
Overseeing all allotted inventory KPIs through
Excel
,
Tableau
, and
SalesForce
. 
●
Closely worked with vendors to improve GMV, RPO & Basket Size.
●
Monitoring each vendor's performance metrics and providing technical support to the vendors.
●
Improved inventory health by
4.2%
in the ﬁrst quarter
and
5.65%
in the second quarter.
●
Achieved
17.16%
increase in GFV of all allotted inventory
by improving operational metrics. 
●
Administered team tracking and generated team reports on a weekly and monthly basis.
Associate-Collection & Recovery                                                                                                    Oct 2021 – Feb 2022
●
Oversaw foodpanda's off-boarded inventory in Lahore.
●
Managed the safe recovery process of foodpanda's assets in Lahore. 
●
Trained new inductees in the same domain.
ORIX Leasing Pakistan Limited, Lahore, Pakistan 
Operations Intern                                                                                                                             Jul 2015 – Aug 2015 
●
Responsible for maintaining data of key accounts and presenting their reports on a weekly basis.
Sindh Bank Limited, Lahore, Pakistan 
Intern                                                                                                                                           May 2015 – June 2015 
●
Screening and maintaining corporate ﬁles at all levels.
ACADEMIC PROJECTS
AQUA TRUCE(Final Year Project) 
●
Product development of an IoT based water tank system
●
Development of a plug and play solution for water tanks 
●
Deploying new features into existing systems such as ambient temperature control, water level monitoring and dry 
running protection.
Review on IoT based Power System Protection System
●
Review on a new “intelligent operation” concept for power system protection based on Internet-of-Things 
incorporated into smart environments
SKILLS
Project Management, Agile, SCRUM, Operations Management, Logistics Management, Communication Skills, 
Supply Chain Management, Analytical Skills, Leadership, Adaptability, Team Work 
Software Skills:
Salesforce, Tableau,
Python, C++,
MATLAB, Arduino, Proteus, HTML, PLC programming, MS 
Office
LANGUAGES
English                                                                           Urdu                                                                             French
Native or Bilingual Proficiency
Full Professional Proficiency                                    Limited Working Proficiency
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
